author: USA TODAY, Maria Puente, USA TODAY
title: Locked-up celebs, fearing coronavirus, fail to win early release from prison, jails
description: Coronavirus is a widespread threat everywhere, especially in prisons and jails, where locked-up celebrities are failing to win early release.
content:
R. Kelly's attorneys say he is innocent until proven guilty, and should be released from prison to minimize his risk of contracting coronavirus. Prosecutors contend the former R&B star, who faces multiple sex-crimes charges, is a flight risk.
